projects.title: Mine Quest
projects.description:
A 2D grid-based exploration and mining game with procedurally generated underground worlds. Players mine resources, battle enemies, and create their own goals in a sandbox environment.

Key Features:
- Procedural World Generation
- Resource Mining and Crafting
- Turn-Based Combat
- Equipment and Progression System
- Multiple Game Modes

projects.title: Ancient Tablet Research Interface (ATRI)
projects.description:
A cutting-edge web application for the analysis and interpretation of ancient artifacts with potential quantum anomalies. Combines modern web technologies with advanced visualization techniques for artifact examination.

The interface provides powerful tools for researchers to analyze and interpret ancient artifacts with unprecedented precision and depth.
features: 3D Artifact Viewer with interactive model manipulation
Spectral Analysis Module for quantum frequency visualization
Material Composition Scanner with elemental mapping
Symbol Recognition System for ancient script analysis
Responsive design with modern UI/UX principles

projects.title: Petri Dish Simulation
projects.description:
An advanced, academic-grade evolutionary simulation exploring emergent behavior, natural selection, and ecosystem dynamics in a controlled grid environment.

This scientific simulation allows for the observation of evolutionary patterns, genetic inheritance, and complex behaviors in a virtual ecosystem.

projects.title: Lizard Game
projects.description:
A delightful, mobile-friendly HTML5 game where you control a customizable lizard to collect leaves, avoid obstacles, and complete challenging levels!

Features progressive difficulty, boss battles, and an achievement system to keep players engaged.
features: Customizable lizard character with various skins
Leaf collection mechanics with different types

projects.title: Portfolio Website

This portfolio includes interactive project showcases, a contact form, and responsive design for all devices.
